data.md:MetaData: Station list and links to master tracks in different resolutions of POLARSTERN cruise ANT-V/5, Puerto Madryn - Bremerhaven, 1987-03-19 - 1987-04-19
Die Expedition ANTARKTIS-V mit FS Polarstern 1986/87, Bericht von den Fahrtabschnitten ANT-V/4-5 (The Expedition ANTARKTIS-V of RV POLARSTERN 1986/87 Report of Legs ANT-V/4-5)
